title: Olympic National Park: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around            Most park destinations can be reached via U.S. Highway 101, which circumnavigates the Olympic Peninsula. Consult the table below for mileages between park areas.        Click on table for larger version. NPS graphic by R. McKenna   Â    Additional Information  Park Roads: Information on closures, construction, and conditions. Facility Opening and Closing Dates: Seasonal opening and closing dates for visitor centers, campgrounds, lodges, and roads.
